mapper.sql: SELECT children.id FROM t_sys_org, t_sys_org as children WHERE t_sys_org.left_num <= children.left_num AND t_sys_org.right_num >= children.left_num and t_sys_org.id=#{ownerOrgId} order by t_sys_org.node_level ASC
mapper.select:
select t_owner_balance.*, (case when t_user.real_name is NULL then t_user.`name` else t_user.real_name end )as userName from t_owner_balance LEFT JOIN t_user on t_user.id=t_owner_balance.user_id WHERE 1=1 and t_owner_balance.balance>0
AND t_owner_balance.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.id},'%')
AND t_owner_balance.user_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.userId},'%')
AND t_owner_balance.balance LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.balance},'%')
AND t_owner_balance.version LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.version},'%')
AND t_owner_balance.start_time >= DATE(#{startTime})
AND t_owner_balance.end_time <= DATE(#{endTime)
AND ( t_user.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') or t_user.real_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') )
AND t_owner_balance.balance >= #{leftMoney}
AND t_owner_balance.balance <= #{rightMoney}
